## Vector2.scaleAndAddToRef() method

Scale the current Vector2 values by a factor and add the result to a given Vector2

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scaleAndAddToRef(scale: number, result: Vector2): Vector2;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | <code>number</code> | defines the scale factor |
|  result | <code>Vector2</code> | defines the Vector2 object where to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector2`

the unmodified current Vector2
